IRQ - Lines and Halfplanes

Create new line

Left click onto the canvas to anchor a new line.
Then left click again to add the displayed line.
If the mouse position is close to the anchored position, the line creation is cancelled.

Clear lines

Double click anywhere to remove all lines.

Insert a Halfplane

The adding of a halfplane is similar to the creation of a line except that the shift button has to be hold simultaneously.
When trying to insert a second halfplane the previous one is destroyed.

Remove the Halfplane

Double click somewhere and hold the shift button simultaneously to destroy the halfplane.

Switch bound area of Halfplane

Click somewhere and hold the Alt (mac: ‚å• option) button simultaneously to switch the bounded area of the halfplane.
